attributes.action: Stop doctors surgeries using 0844 telephone numbers
attributes.additional_details:
Using 0844 numbers is costing  all patients to book appointments, get test results and order prescriptions  without realising just how much they are paying. Most people have paid the NHS in taxation ,are on low incomes or housebound  and   the cost of a MINIMUM of £ 2  a time is too much.

This was supposed to be stopped but many GP surgeries  have ignored this  directive
